message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1500000. This is a fair price considering the value and potential of this opportunity.  I'm confident it will be a profitable investment for you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $1500000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $1200000?
